entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:41 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.1°C
Wind: WSW 41 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
